name: Tappers Braille Fridge Magnets
description:
Spelling Magnets 
1 sets of Tappers Braille magnets
They are a  fun way for children to learn to spell, whille also learning the patterns of braille from a-z.
The national literacy strategy is at the heart of the drive to raise standards in schools. so why not let our kids learn to read and write with the bonus of learning the patterns of braille at the same time

name: Tappers Braille work book
description:
“Tappers Brail” an exciting interactive, friendly new work tool for parents, carers and anyone who works with people who are visually impaired. 

This innovative new tool can be used by individuals who are losing their vision and also work as an excellent tool for visually able people.  This would also benefit people who live or are in contact with the visually impaired. “Tappers Brail” is easy to understand and has an accessible format which has been developed and designed over a period of time.  This is highly useful as an introductory or educational tool into the world of Brail.

The concept combines the Brail characters with their corresponding alphabetic figure creating an iconic image which imprints on the mind of the recipient, allowing for easy recall of the image with the signified characters and letters.
